nodes.title: Sneakypeer – Full cycle SaaS development
nodes.content:
Sneakypeer is one of the most complex projects which /KALMARS/ has developed. All development lifecycle has been covered trough out a year.

All of the website design implementation and participation in customer design workshop sessions.

The list of functionalities is listed below:

  • Login and registration with verification
  • Ability to add news trought admin panel
  • Mutliple API connections to gather the data about P2P platforms
  • Data science to calculate platform scoring
  • Monitoring funcionality to paid users
  • Email
  • Custom payment checkout flow development by using STRIPE api
  • Admin panel which is based on Laravel framework
